dc_title_s: Plan of London and Westminster, with the borough of Southwark : reduced from the large plan in forty sheets
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures.   Includes statistical table and index to principal streets, places, courts, squares, markets, public buildings, &c. &c.   "Note: the squares formed by the intersections of perpendicular & horizontal lines, and indicated by the letters and figures on the border, represent the corresponding sheets of the large plan, and refer also to the annexed list of the principal streets, &c."|77 x 112 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:12,500|City Maps
